quotes.quote: So vast is art, so narrow human wit.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Nature hasn't gone anywhere. It is all around us, all the planets, galaxies and so on. We are nothing in comparison.
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.quote: Lend yourself to others, but give yourself to yourself.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno
